Why don't the people saying this is tracked by their ISP tell us which ISP they're using so we can change to ISP's that don't invade our privacy?
Think about it.
BTW, I was not tracked by my ISP. Columbia Pictures sent a complant to my ISP (suddenlink). So Columbia Pictures is tracking this.

**WARNING: TRACKED BY COLUMBIA PICTURES**

I have just registered to make sure people are aware that this torrent is tracked. I've downloaded several hundred torrents now, and this is the first complaint I've received from my ISP and/or an industry company.

This is not to be taken as defamation at the torrent publisher, as the movie quality is great, however Columbia is tracing this file.

They're essentially remarkably polite about the situation.

!!WARNING: TRACKED BY COLUMBIA PICTURES!!

Same here. Have downloaded tons of torrents and this is the first copyright infringement notice i've received. Registered on TPB just to inform everyone! download at your own risk!

My ISP is TPG and they forwarded MediaSentry's (Columbia Pictures) notice on to me. Here's a partial extract of the email:

"We are writing this letter on behalf of Columbia Pictures Industries Inc., ("Columbia Pictures") who owns certain rights under copyright law in the title The Other Guys.
You are receiving this notice because your Internet account was identified as having been used recently to copy and/or distribute illegally the copyrighted motion pictures and/or television shows listed at the bottom of this notice. This notice provides you with the information you need in order to take immediate action that can prevent serious legal and other consequences. These actions include:
1. Stop downloading or uploading without authorization any motion pictures or TV shows owned or distributed by Columbia Pictures; and
2. Permanently delete from your computer(s) all unauthorized copies you may have already made of these movies and TV shows.

If this notice is being received by an Internet Service Provider (ISP), please forward the notice to the individual associated with the activities.
bla bla bla bla...
Respectfully,

A Kempe
Enforcement Coordinator
MediaSentry"

Btw as for the movie:
A: 9 (voice is clearly audible, no background noise, etc.)

V: 7 (grainy, but if you're not fussy it is very much watch-able)
